name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Gen AI/Agentic AI Developer
professional_summary: Utilized Python and LangChain to build a healthcare claims processing agent, reducing manual effort by automating claim validation and fraud detection, ensuring HIPAA compliance throughout the process.
Implemented Google ADK for secure data retrieval in an insurance policy recommendation system, enhancing data accuracy and customer satisfaction by providing personalized policy suggestions.
Developed a banking chatbot using LangChain and Python, integrating with AWS services to handle customer inquiries, reducing response times and improving user experience.
Engineered a healthcare virtual assistant with LangChain, enabling patients to schedule appointments and access medical records securely, adhering to GDPR regulations.
Applied Python and LangChain to create a fraud detection system for banking transactions, leveraging AWS Lambda for real-time processing, significantly reducing fraudulent activities.
Built a healthcare provider search tool using LangChain and Python, allowing patients to find specialists based on insurance coverage, improving accessibility and user engagement.
Deployed a claims processing automation system in the insurance sector using Python and LangChain, streamlining workflows and reducing processing times by automating repetitive tasks.
Developed a banking loan approval assistant with LangChain, integrating with Azure services to assess creditworthiness, enhancing decision-making accuracy and customer satisfaction.
Implemented a healthcare diagnosis assistant using LangChain and Python, assisting doctors in diagnosing conditions based on patient symptoms, improving diagnostic accuracy and efficiency.
Created a policy comparison tool for insurance customers using Python and LangChain, enabling side-by-side policy comparisons, enhancing transparency and customer trust.
Engineered a banking transaction monitoring system with LangChain, detecting anomalies in real-time using AWS services, ensuring PCI compliance and security.
Built a healthcare patient engagement platform using LangChain and Python, allowing patients to track health metrics and receive personalized recommendations, improving patient outcomes.
Utilized Python and LangChain to develop a banking customer segmentation model, integrating with Azure services to tailor marketing strategies, increasing campaign effectiveness.
Implemented a healthcare claims fraud detection system with LangChain, leveraging Google ADK for secure data access, reducing fraudulent claims and operational costs.
Developed an insurance policy renewal assistant using Python and LangChain, automating renewal reminders and processing, improving customer retention and operational efficiency.
Created a banking risk assessment tool with LangChain, integrating with Azure services to evaluate loan risks, enhancing risk management and decision-making processes.
Deployed a healthcare appointment scheduling system using LangChain and Python, enabling patients to book appointments seamlessly, reducing wait times and improving patient satisfaction.

Cloud Platforms: AWS (S3, SageMaker, Lambda, EC2, RDS, Redshift, Bedrock)
Azure (ML Studio, Data Factory, Databricks, Cosmos DB)
GCP (Big Query, Vertex AI, Cloud SQL)
